thread.title: Armie Hammer’s Twitter “likes” include rope bondage
thread.title_full: Armie Hammer’s Twitter “likes” include rope bondage

author: Derek de Koff
title: Armie Hammer’s Twitter “likes” include rope bondage
text:
Apparently Armie Hammer doesn’t realize everyone can see his Twitter “likes.” 
While we don’t recommend taking a look at the office, you can scroll through screenshots of Hammer’s rather scandalous Twitter “likes” here , if you so choose. There’s quite clearly a theme. 
Related: Watch: Armie Hammer seduces Timothee Chalamet in “Call Me By Your Name” 
Meanwhile, the Twitterverse is tittering over the news: Is Armie Hammer horni for bondage or just horni for knots 
— erin brockobitch (@boners) March 14, 2017 
If you're out here kink-shaming Armie Hammer, call your therapist. They'd like to plan a field day with you. 
— Phil Nobile Jr. (@PhilNobileJr) March 14, 2017 
I am stunned the romance novel world hasn't written a hundred Armie Hammer stand-in stories, even without the rope bondage fetish. pic.twitter.com/Pxwu6IVBn1 
— Kayleigh Anne (@Ceilidhann) March 14, 2017 
dam armie hammer thought twitter was his own private rope play sanctuary 
— audacious heroine (@bloodbuzz) March 12, 2017 
armie hammer right now probably pic.twitter.com/TLZKPTc7fo 
— james ;3c (@bimccree) March 13, 2017
